alert.note: Alert for Eastland; Stephens (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 6:09PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Eastland and southwestern Stephens Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a couple of strong thunderstorms. The strongest was located 7 miles northeast of Rising Star, or 13 miles south of Cisco. This storm was nearly stationary. Several outflow boundaries may lead to gusty winds as well. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breckenridge, Eastland, Cisco, Rising Star, Lake Cisco, Gunsight, Lake Daniel, Lake Olden, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Pleasant Hill, Carbon, Nimrod, Sabanno, Eolian, Harpersville, Okra, Morton Valley, Pioneer, Scranton, and I-20 Near The Callahan-Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 323 and 343. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
